title: Making Its Way Among The Stars
alternative_title: Breaking the Stars; Go Against to Break the Stars ;  Nì Pò Xīng Chén
status: Breaking the Stars; Go Against to Break the Stars ;  Nì Pò Xīng Chén
description:
Description :
        Making its way among the starsWu Di, an unemployed loser, is accidentally possessed by the Ancient Ruler, "the Emperor: Yiu shan", and is brought to life with the power of the Star Wheel, unleashing unprecedented abilities. When the ruler awakens, the ancient gods of the earth are agitated and want to devour the power of the "star wheel", and the restless old Earth gods devour Wu Di's mother in the battle for the Star Wheel. Thus begins the revenge! For the good of my family! I, WuDi! I will kill all the Ancient gods!
